Name: Awakening
About the game: Awakening is powerful rapid application authoring tool for efficiently creating interactive 3D content. With it, you can easily creating eye-catching interactive 3D presentations, animated 3D web, brief film, game... Awakening 3D solution include three modules: Scene Editor ( Awakening.exe ), Scene Player ( WindsPlayer.exe ) and Web3D Player ( supports IE & Firefox family ). Awakening presentations are typically used for making short movies, product and architectural visualizations, e.g. for sales, support and e-learning purposes, or, for product branding or prototyping. * Compact & flexible runtimeï¼Œyou can custom features by c++ sdk, or extend script functions. * You can still use Fixed Function Pipeline to get high-performance rendering on low-end video cards, this features especially useful in VR ( VR will be supported soon ).
